column1: Barazinbar is the Khuzdul name for Redhorn
column3: named Caradhras in Sindarin. During the reign of Durin VI
column4: the dwarves of Moria mined beneath Baranzinbar seeking mithril. In doing so

column1: It was also called Baraz meaning "Red".
